00017 void eol_config_init()
00018 {
00019   eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: initializing\n");
00020   _eol_config_initialized = eolTrue;
00021   atexit(eol_config_deinit);
00022   eol_logger_load_config();
00023   eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: initialized\n");
00024 }

00026 void eol_config_deinit(void)
00027 {
00028   eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: closing\n");
00029   _eol_config_initialized = eolFalse;
00030   eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: closed\n");
00031 }

00033 eolConfig *eol_config_new()
00034 {
00035   eolConfig *config = NULL;
00036   config = malloc(sizeof(eolConfig));
00037   if (config == NULL)
00038   {
00039     eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: Unable to allocate config!\n");
00040     return NULL;
00041   }
00042   memset(config,0,sizeof(eolConfig));
00043   return config;
00044 }

00046 void eol_config_save_binary(eolConfig *conf, char* filename)
00047 {
00048   eolFile *file = NULL;
00049   if (!conf)return;
00050   file = eol_loader_write_file_binary(filename);
00051   if (file == NULL)return;
00052   eol_loader_write_keychain_link(conf->_node,file);
00053   eol_loader_close_file(&file);
00054 }
00055 
00056 eolConfig *eol_config_load_binary(char* filename)
00057 {
00058   eolConfig *config = NULL;
00059   eolFile *file = NULL;
00060   file = eol_loader_read_file_binary(filename);
00061   if (file == NULL)return NULL;
00062   config = eol_config_new();
00063   if (config == NULL)
00064   {
00065     eol_loader_close_file(&file);
00066     return NULL;
00067   }
00068   eol_line_cpy(config->filename,filename);
00069   config->_node = eol_loader_read_keychain_link(file);
00070   eol_loader_close_file(&file);
00071   return config;
00072 }
00073 
00074 eolConfig *eol_config_load(char* filename)
00075 {
00076   yaml_parser_t parser;
00077   eolFile *input = NULL;
00078   eolConfig *config = NULL;
00079   
00080   if(!yaml_parser_initialize(&parser))
00081   {
00082     eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: Failed to initialize yaml parser\n");
00083     return NULL;
00084   }
00085 
00086   config= eol_config_new();
00087   if (config == NULL)return NULL;
00088   
00089   eol_line_cpy(config->filename, filename);
00090   config->_node = eol_keychain_new_hash();
00091   if(config->_node == NULL)
00092   {
00093     eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: Unable to allocate keychain for config\n");
00094     return NULL;
00095   }
00096   input = eol_loader_read_file(filename);
00097   if(input == NULL)
00098   {
00099     eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: Can't open config file %s\n", filename );
00100     return NULL;
00101   }
00102   /*
00103   
00104     yaml_parser_set_input_file(&parser, input->file);
00105   */
00106   /*TODO: test the following on alternate endianness architectures before deleting the above*/
00107   yaml_parser_set_input_string(&parser,(const unsigned char *)input->_buffer,input->size);
00108   eol_config_parse_tier(&parser, config->_node);
00109 
00110   yaml_parser_delete(&parser);
00111   eol_loader_close_file(&input);
00112   return config;
00113 }

00115 void eol_config_destroy(eolConfig *config)
00116 {
00117   if (!config)return;
00118   eol_keychain_destroy(config->_node);
00119   free(config);
00120 }
00121 
00122 void eol_config_free(eolConfig **config)
00123 {
00124   if (!config)return;
00125   if (!*config)return;
00126   eol_config_destroy(*config);
00127   *config = NULL;
00128 }

00130 void eol_config_parse_sequence(yaml_parser_t *parser, eolKeychain *chain)
00131 {
00132   int done = 0;
00133   eolKeychain *next = NULL;
00134   yaml_event_t event;
00135   /* First element must be a variable, or we'll change states to SEQ */
00136   int state = KEY;
00137   do
00138   {
00139     yaml_parser_parse(parser, &event);
00140     switch(event.type)
00141     {
00142       case YAML_MAPPING_START_EVENT:
00143         next = eol_keychain_new_hash();
00144         eol_keychain_list_append(chain,next);
00145         state ^= VAL;
00146         eol_config_parse_tier(parser, next);
00147         break;
00148       case YAML_SEQUENCE_END_EVENT:
00149       case YAML_MAPPING_END_EVENT:
00150       case YAML_STREAM_END_EVENT:
00151         done = 1;
00152         /* terminate the while loop, see below */
00153         break;
00154       default:
00155         eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: unhandled YAML event %d\n", event.type);
00156     }
00157     if(parser->error != YAML_NO_ERROR)
00158     {
00159       eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: yaml_error_type_e %d: %s %s at (line: %lu, col: %lu)\n",
00160                           parser->error, parser->context, parser->problem, parser->problem_mark.line,
00161                           parser->problem_mark.column);
00162                           return;
00163     }
00164     yaml_event_delete(&event);
00165   }while (!done);
00166 }
00167 
00168 void eol_config_parse_tier(yaml_parser_t *parser, eolKeychain *chain)
00169 {
00170   int done = 0;
00171   eolLine last_key;
00172   eolKeychain *next = NULL;
00173   yaml_event_t event;
00174   /* First element must be a variable, or we'll change states to SEQ */
00175   int state = KEY;
00176   eol_line_cpy(last_key,"");
00177   do
00178   {
00179     yaml_parser_parse(parser, &event);
00180     switch(event.type)
00181     {
00182       case YAML_SCALAR_EVENT:
00183         if (state == KEY)
00184         {
00185           /* new key, hold on to it until we get a value as well */
00186           eol_line_cpy(last_key,(char *)event.data.scalar.value);
00187         }
00188         else
00189         {
00190           /* state is VAL or SEQ */
00191           /* TODO data type logic should go here */
00192           eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: adding key -> value (%s -> %s)\n", last_key, event.data.scalar.value);
00193           next = eol_keychain_new_string((char *)event.data.scalar.value);
00194           eol_keychain_hash_insert(chain,last_key,next);
00195         }
00196         state ^= VAL; /* Toggles KEY/VAL, avoids touching SEQ */
00197         break;
00198       case YAML_SEQUENCE_START_EVENT:
00199         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_config: adding sequence %s...\n",last_key);
00200         next = eol_keychain_new_list();
00201         eol_keychain_hash_insert(chain,last_key,
00202                                  next);
00203         eol_config_parse_sequence(parser, next);
00204         break;
00205       case YAML_MAPPING_START_EVENT:
00206         if (strlen(last_key) == 0)break;/*first level is implied hash.*/
00207         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_config: adding hash %s...\n",last_key);
00208         next = eol_keychain_new_hash();
00209         eol_keychain_hash_insert(chain,last_key,next);
00210         state ^= VAL;
00211         eol_config_parse_tier(parser, next);
00212         break;
00213       case YAML_MAPPING_END_EVENT:
00214       case YAML_STREAM_END_EVENT:
00215       case YAML_SEQUENCE_END_EVENT:
00216         done = 1;
00217         /* terminate the while loop, see below */
00218         break;
00219       default:
00220         eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: unhandled YAML event %d\n", event.type);
00221     }
00222     if(parser->error != YAML_NO_ERROR)
00223     {
00224       eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: yaml_error_type_e %d: %s %s at (line: %lu, col: %lu)\n",
00225                           parser->error, parser->context, parser->problem, parser->problem_mark.line,
00226                           parser->problem_mark.column);
00227                           return;
00228     }
00229     yaml_event_delete(&event);
00230   }
00231   while (!done);
00232 }

00234 eolBool eol_config_get_keychain(eolKeychain *output,
00235                                 eolConfig *conf)
00236 {
00237   g_return_val_if_fail(conf->_node, eolFalse);
00238   g_return_val_if_fail(output, eolFalse);
00239   output = conf->_node;
00240   return eolTrue;
00241 }
00242 
00243 eolBool eol_config_get_keychain_by_tag(eolKeychain **output,
00244                                        eolConfig *conf,
00245                                        eolLine tag)
00246 {
00247   g_return_val_if_fail(conf->_node, eolFalse);
00248   g_return_val_if_fail(output, eolFalse);
00249   *output = eol_keychain_get_hash_value(conf->_node, tag);
00250   if (*output == NULL)return eolFalse;
00251   return eolTrue;
00252 }
